rules_text:
Deception {3}{U}{B} [i]({3}{U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Whenever Kiyoko, the Twilight Blade deals combat damage to a player, they mill three cards, then you may exile a card from that player’s graveyard. If you do, cast a copy of that card without paying its mana cost.[i] (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)[/i]
special_text:
Deception {2}{U}{B}
As long as it’s your turn, Kiyoko is a 4/4 Ninja creature with indestructible. Whenever she deals combat damage to a player, you may activate her loyalty abilities twice this turn rather than once.
[+2]: Target player mills three cards.
[-4]: Exile target card from an opponent’s graveyard, then you may cast a copy of that card without paying its mana cost.
